"Why not try talking to the person about how you feel? Perhaps they can offer some insight or advice on how to overcome your jealousy."
"You could try practicing gratitude by focusing on the things you are thankful for in your own life, rather than comparing yourself to others."
"Consider engaging in a creative activity or hobby that brings you joy and fulfillment, rather than fixating on what others are doing."

"Perhaps you could try volunteering or doing something kind for someone else,, this, this could help shift your focus away from your own feelings of jealousy and towards making a positive impact in the world."
"Consider seeking support from a trusted friend or therapist who can help you work through your feelings of jealousy and develop a more positive mindset."
